name: Santa's Journey Home
description:
Santa's Journey Home is a small project I did in a few weeks to further learn UE4 and make something Jolly.

The game is supposed to be a rage game, meaning that the character is not the easiest to control and the game is not very forgiving when it comes to mistakes. A mistake could result in having to start from the beginning.

The game is entirely done by me including assets and music, (with a few exceptions of CC0 assets, mostly sounds).

Let me know if there are any bugs, I had a bug last second when packaging the game so didn't have time to playtest the final game.

If you have trouble accessing the file it is likely due to your firewall.

There will be a devlog on the game as well, I would appreciate if you watch that on youtube :)
